api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Jira API Token. See the docs for more information on how to generate this key. API Token is used for Authorization to your account: https://go.estuary.dev/Bk7fII

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The Domain for your Jira account, e.g. estuary.atlassian.net, estuary.jira.com, jira.your-domain.com

email.title: Email
email.description: The user email for your Jira account which you used to generate the API token. This field is used for Authorization to your account by BasicAuth.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: List of Jira project keys to replicate data for, or leave it empty if you want to replicate data for all projects.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you want to replicate data from Jira, use the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. Note that this field only applies to certain streams, and only data generated on or after the start date will be replicated. Or leave it empty if you want to replicate all data. For more information, refer to the documentation: https://go.estuary.dev/Bk7fII

resourceConfigSchema.title: ResourceConfig
resourceConfigSchema.description: ResourceConfig encodes a configured resource stream

syncMode.title: Sync Mode
syncMode.description: Sync this resource incrementally, or fully refresh it every run

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: Enclosing schema namespace of this resource
